title: Reaction To 'Torture Report' Shows A Nation Divided
teaser: Enhanced interrogation. Torture. Black sites. The War on Terror. The politics have been fraught for a decade now. We survey reactions to Tuesday's release of the executive summary of what's come to be known as the so-called "torture report."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
